member.name: T:JQChart.Web.Mvc.LinearGradient
member.remarks:
Linear gradients are defined by an imaginary line which defines the direction of the gradient and list of color stops.
Color stops are placed along the imaginary line somewhere between 0 and 1, where 0 is at the starting (x0, y0) point, and 1 is at the ending (x, y1) point.
